title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.3 - Criminal nuisance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.3 - Criminal nuisance

State Regulations

No person while at any transportation facility, by conduct
either unlawful in itself or unreasonable under all the circumstances, shall
knowingly or recklessly create or maintain a condition which endangers the
safety or health of a considerable number of persons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1151.3

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
